APIs: From Tech to Biz Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(4) APIs are Different Things to Different People

  • Old-school IT: Local application programming interface
  • Web-age IT: Networked application programming interface
  • IT architect: One of many connector types for software components
  • CDO: The foundational glue for digital transformation
  • CEO: An additional way to support or establish value chains


APIs: From Tech to Biz Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(5) The Wonders of APIs



APIs: From Tech to Biz Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(6) Nobody (really) wants APIs



APIs: From Tech to Biz Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(7) Mind the API Gap

  • Most APIs are technical APIs (and that's fine)
  • Business APIs will have the biggest business impact
  • Aligning both perspectives needs a holistic strategy
  • API management should embrace both perspectives


APIs: From Tech to Biz Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(8) Three Simple Tips for a Better API Strategy

  1. Start approaching APIs with a product mindset [Products (1)]
  2. Manage APIs [Management (1)] as business assets
  3. Drive API consumption [Consumption (1)] with marketing

(10) What is a Product?



Products Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(11) What is a Good API (Product)?

  1. It's well-designed
  2. It's designed with consumers in mind
  3. It's designed to be used by many consumers
  4. It's following a product lifecycle
  5. It's easily findable and consumable
  6. It's marketed with the target audience in mind


Products Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(16) API Management Goals

  • Simplify API production
  • Unify APIs across the organizational landscape
  • Make APIs easier to find and consume


Management Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(17) Automating API Guidelines



Management Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(18) API Guidelines Change Over Time



Management Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(19) API Landscape Management Matters

  • Evolution of API styles
  • Decentralization of API management
  • New consumer groups for specific groups of API
  • Different views of the API landscape

Consumption Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(21) Products Need Marketing

  • Traditional 1:1 integration creates one solution for each problem
  • API 1:n interconnection creates a product intended for a market
  • Products drive value only when they are being consumed
  • The main drivers for your business are excellent API product candidates
    • Ordering should be open so that partners or 3rd party apps can create orders
    • Delivery should be flexible so that new delivery options are easy to add
    • Invoicing should be flexible so that new payment methods are easy to add


Consumption Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

Conclusions Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(26) Focus on Value

  • APIs are most valuable when they drive digital transformation
  • APIs are not sufficient but they are necessary for digital transformation
  • APIs can help most by
    • focusing on creating valuable API products [Products (1)],
    • managing [Management (1)] those in a unified way across the organization,
    • and marketing them to drive API consumption [Consumption (1)]


Conclusions Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management
